page.title: 02PEEBLESSHIRE NEWS EXTRACTS
page.content: The 14.6.85 paper mainly deals with the{Beltane Festival.}The Cornet is {Robert Millar}(31 & a Gutterbluid),the Lass is Robert's wife{Doreen.}Callants Club gave 12 'mice costumes' & renewed the maids' dresses;money also raised by sale of 'Ballad of a Border Town',a cassette tape by local performers. {Patricia Ferguson}(a former Beltane Queen) will read 'Proclamation of King James VI'.1985 Beltane Queen is{Jane {Love.Wm Goodburn}is Warden of Neidpath &{Rev.K.Crozier}is Warden of Cross Kirk. A{property}for sale- modern bungalow/3 dbl bedrooms/living room/dining room/ study/bathroom/cloakroom/dbl garage/ car port-offers over Â£57,000. In{Sheriff Court}a{Peebles}man pleaded guilty to being found near the{Tweed in possession of a car, cleek & stick, wet suit,3 headlamps & a sack.
